patch.description: Update specific fields of a book

costPerSprint.description: The cost associated with each sprint.

benefitPerSprint.description: The benefit derived from each sprint.

numberOfSprints.description: The total number of sprints planned for the project.

costPerSprint.description: The cost associated with each sprint.

benefitPerSprint.description: The benefit derived from each sprint.

numberOfSprints.description: The total number of sprints planned for the project.

totalCosts.description: The total costs accumulated over all sprints.

totalBenefits.description: The total benefits accumulated over all sprints.

totalCumulativeCostsPerSprint.description: List of total costs accumulated by each sprint, where the first entry can be null to indicate no data.

totalCumulativeBenefitsPerSprint.description: List of total benefits accumulated by each sprint, where the first entry can be null to indicate no data.

profitPerSprint.description: List of profits per each sprint, where the first entry can be null to indicate no data.

totalCumulativeProfitPerSprint.description: List of cumulative profit per each sprint, where the first entry can be null to indicate no data.

sprintROI.description: Return on investment for each sprint, where the first entry can be null to indicate no data and other entries are typically integers.

allUnreadMessages.description: The total number of unread messages.

2.description: The number of unread messages for user with ID 2.

unreadMessagesPerUser.description: The number of unread messages per user.

numberOfEnvs.description: The number of environments in which the test cases are executed.

numberOfSprints.description: The total number of sprints covered by the test cases.

baseTestCases.description: The initial number of test cases available before any modifications.

startingTestCases.description: The number of test cases at the start of testing.

newTestsPerRelease.description: The proportion of new test cases added per release.

modifiedTestsPerRelease.description: The proportion of existing test cases modified per release.

removedTestsPerRelease.description: The proportion of test cases removed per release.

automationNotApplicable.description: The proportion of test cases where automation is not applicable.

averageEffortOnModificationOfManualTC.description: The average effort required to modify a manual test case, as a fraction of total effort.

averageEffortOnModificationOfAutomatedTC.description: The average effort required to modify an automated test case, as a fraction of total effort.

numberOfAutomationOfBaseTestCases.description: The proportion of base test cases that are automated.

manualCreationHours.description: The number of hours needed to create a manual test case.

manualExecutionHours.description: The number of hours needed to execute a manual test case.

automationCreationHours.description: The number of hours needed to create an automated test case.

automationExecutionHours.description: The number of hours needed to execute an automated test case.

additionalMaintenanceHours.description: The additional hours required for maintaining test cases per sprint.

hourlyCost.description: The cost per hour for conducting testing.

numberOfSprints.description: Number of sprints for the project.

baseTestCases.description: Base number of test cases at the beginning of the project.

startingTestCases.description: Number of test cases available at the start.

newTestsPerRelease.description: Percentage of new tests added per release.

modifiedTestsPerRelease.description: Percentage of tests modified per release.

removedTestsPerRelease.description: Percentage of tests removed per release.

automationNotApplicable.description: Percentage of tests not suitable for automation.

averageEffortOnModificationOfManualTC.description: Average effort required to modify a manual test case.

averageEffortOnModificationOfAutomatedTC.description: Average effort required to modify an automated test case.

numberOfAutomationOfBaseTestCases.description: Percentage of base test cases that are automated.

manualCreationHours.description: Hours required to create a manual test case.

manualExecutionHours.description: Hours required to execute a manual test case.

automationCreationHours.description: Hours required to create an automated test case.

automationExecutionHours.description: Hours required to execute an automated test case.

additionalMaintenanceHours.description: Additional hours per sprint for maintenance.

newTests.description: Number of new tests introduced in each sprint.

totalTestCases.description: Total number of test cases after each sprint.

modifiedTests.description: Number of modified tests in each sprint.

removedTests.description: Number of removed tests in each sprint.

automationNotApplicableTests.description: Count of tests unsuitable for automation in each sprint.

creation.description: Effort in hours for creating manual test cases per sprint.

execution.description: Effort in hours for executing manual test cases per sprint.

creation.description: Cost of creating manual test cases per sprint.

execution.description: Cost of executing manual test cases per sprint.

total.description: Total manual testing cost per sprint.
Total number of automated tests per sprint.

creation.description: Effort in hours for creating automated test cases per sprint.

execution.description: Effort in hours for executing automated test cases per sprint.

maintenance.description: Maintenance hours for automated test cases per sprint.

creation.description: Cost of creating automated test cases per sprint.

execution.description: Cost of executing automated test cases per sprint.

maintenance.description: Maintenance costs for automated test cases per sprint.

total.description: Total cost of automation per sprint.

automationAdditionalCosts.description: Additional costs incurred due to automation per sprint.

roi.description: Return on investment from the project.

published_at.description: The date and time when the book was published.
